title: Ep#25 - The Follower
itunes:title: Ep#25 - The Follower
itunes:subtitle: A young woman shares ghostly encounters she has been experiencing since she was a child. One fateful night she realizes the most terrifying visit is still to come. (Based on true events)
description:
A young woman shares ghostly encounters she has been experiencing since she was a child. One fateful night she realizes the most terrifying visit is still to come. (Based on true events). **Join our official Patreon and support the show! Get ad-free episodes, shout-outs, and more.
